thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Nutanix Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.39

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Nutanix Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.39
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Nutanix Inc:
* NUTANIX REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q3 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.21
* SEES Q3 2018 REVENUE $275 MILLION TO $280 MILLION * QTRLY REVENUE $286.7 MILLION, GROWING 44% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* QTRLY BILLINGS $355.9 MILLION, GROWING 57% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $283.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.23, REVENUE VIEW $267.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
